creditline: Gift of Sandra and Peter Butler
description: sketchy image of sailboats on choppy water under grey and blue clouds; pink, blue and grey sheets of rain
markings: on backing board: Galerie Beyeler label
medium: Black chalk and watercolor on graph paper
provenance: [Ponts des Arts, Paris, until 1964; sold, July 12, to GB]; [Galerie Beyeler, Basel, Switzerland, 1964-1965, no. 4156; sold December 1, to Goodman]; [James Goodman Gallery, Buffalo,1965]. [Jerrold Morris International Gallery, Ltd., Toronto, 1965; sold to Butler]; Patrick (1901-1990) and Aimee Mott (1902-1993) Butler, St. Paul (from 1965); by descent, Peter and Sandra Butler, St. Paul (until 2011; given to Mia).
signed: No signature visible on recto; possibly inscribed [BO] at right.
title: Boats Sailing on the Sea
